about_me.des: I am a Ph.D. candidate in Tsinghua University

projects.saplatform: Saplatform is a automated service for operations, it has asset management, project release, database access function, it can control mass servers.
projects.jalpc: Jalpc is a simple, beautiful and swift theme for Jekyll. It has comprehensive function, it can be easily used and edited. It's adapted for many kinds devices.
projects.angularjs: It is a web font application written by Angularjs and deployed by Jekyll on github (gh-pages), the backend platform is Leancloud, you can use Parse as well.
projects.rsser: Rsser is an Ionic application, with this application we can read news and articles freely, you can add rss address from the given list and add it manually.

career.wxsc_des: Now I work in National Supercomputing Center in Wuxi, which hosts the fastest super computer in the world.
career.statoil_des: Design and implement a CPU-GPU hybrid parallel strategy for beam migration, which is a highly efficient migration method for subsurface imaging.
career.thu_des: I started my PhD career in the department of Computer Science, Tsinghua University. My research interests include accelerating the computationally intensive applications such as the oil & gas applications with the state-of-art high performance computing (HPC) technology, and designing extremely low-latency FPGA circuits for financial applications.
career.sysu_des: I got my BS degree in the major of Computer Science in Sun Yat-sen University.
